<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create Security Groups</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/securitygroups"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Set security group associated with the user's account.
